Articles.Content:
Point of the game is pretty simple. Ask a question (preferably not too easy) and have someone answer it. Then they get to ask a question, and so on...

Try not to use this as a place for all your homework solutions.

I'll start. How would you describe KSP?

well ducttape,scrapmetal,and kerbals

How would your rate Mlp?(I am thinking of seeing this show)

-472,339,097/100

How would you go about making a anatomically correct robot?

3D print it.

How would you get a man to mars?

Srb ,and jeb

how would you describe flim ,and flam while defining Nonperial.

best at being musical conmen

How would you paint with all the colours of the wind?

With a paintbrush

How would you teach a 6 year old orbital mechanics?

With KSP

How would you survive an asteroid?

my hole is asteroid proof

how would you make the best pizza

With the best ingredients.

How would you really be far even as decided to use even go want to do look more like?

Pumpkin

How would you enter your self built spaceship in real life?
Billy Mays will sell the idea to whoever's in charge.
How would you make a SRB?

Put some TNT in a tin can.

How would you make Jeb scared?

Leave him sitting on the ground at Kerbin.

How would you Actually get to Eeloo.

You make safety regulations. Use basic orbital mechanics knowledge and a big rocket.

How would you get to another star without nuclear or chemical rockets?

Edited June 5, 2013 by rryy
Ninja'd

Magnets.

How would you plant a tree?

Dig hole. Deposit tree.

How would one revive the happiness in ones online heart?

We're all at a loss for that now Rage...

How would you dock?

...One does not simply "dock" onto Mordor station.

How would one eat just one lays potato chip?

Put it in your mouth and chew it, then swallow it.

How could we make an insanity thread that won't get locked by moderators?

We beg for their forgiveness and follow the rules letter-to-letter.

How would we cheer up now?

SpaceBikes:

How would we Revolt?

Weaponize the SpaceBike.

How would we win?

Use a thousand SRB's attached to it.

How do we create space bikes that work on Kerbin?
